## {{< fa users-rectangle >}} &nbsp;Webinars


<center>
<img class="picture" width="50%" src="../images/logo-cesabinar.jpg" />
</center>

**CESABINARs** are monthly webinars designed to provide [FRB-CESAB research groups](https://www.fondationbiodiversite.fr/en/the-frb-in-action/programs-and-projects/le-cesab/) with a platform to present their key findings once their residency has ended. Open to the entire scientific community, these webinars offer the opportunity to discover the advancements and work emerging from FRB-CESAB.

{{< fa brands youtube >}}&nbsp; You can watch all the talks on [Youtube](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL1iYPJZT3BJZHeUKAiCSvGIe5eFTlvHTg&si=Q55S1otqjDZZmyVu)
